titleStmt.title: Immediate addresse vnto God alone First deliuered in a sermon before his Maiestie at Windsore. Since reuised and inlarged to a just treatise of inuocation of saints. Occasioned by a false imputation of M. Antonius De Dominis vpon the authour, Richard Montagu.
titleStmt.author: Montagu, Richard, 1577-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby, for Matthew Lownes and William Barret,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A treatise of the inuocation of saints.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
